block.p: SHAY-David. On December 1st. Beloved husband of Lynn. Devoted brother of Nancy Stevens, Dale, Gordon, John R. Jr. and John Shay. Reposing 2-5 and 7-9 Tuesday and Wednesday at Frank E. Campbell, Madison Ave at 81 St. Service on Wednesday, December 3, 10 A.M. at All Souls Unitarian Church, 1157 Lexington Avenue at 80th St. Interment private. In lieu of flowers contributions may be made to the Little Hill FoundationAlina Lodge, attn, Kathy Coutourier, Box G, Blairstown, N.J. 08725
